code: import'./App.css';import{useState}from'react';import google from'./google-play-badge.png';import apple from'./app-store.svg';import character from'./character.png';import Modal from'./Components/Modal';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[modalContent,setModalContent]=useState('');const[showModal,setShowModal]=useState(false);function handleShowModal(content){setModalContent(content);setShowModal(true);}function handleCloseModal(){setShowModal(false);setModalContent('');}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"hero",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"StorySprout"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Never-ending stories for kids and their big people."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:google,alt:"play store link",className:"play-store-link"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:apple,alt:"app store link",className:"app-store-link"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"character",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:character,alt:"character",className:"character-img"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"footer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>handleShowModal({title:'Privacy Policy',text:'Some privacy Policy Text'}),children:"Privacy Policy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:()=>handleShowModal({title:'Support',text:'Some Support content'}),children:"Support"})]}),showModal&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Modal,{content:modalContent,cb:handleCloseModal})]});}export default App;
